document.title: Staffing and Managing Benefits Planning, Assistance, and Outreach Programs: Tips for Coordinators and Managers
document.abstract: This publication is a human resources guide to staffing and managing effective benefits planning, assistance and outreach programs. Specifically the publication provides helpful tips and strategies for staff recruitment; interviewing; developing competitive benefits packages; developing practical job descriptions; staff development and advancement; and, tools for effective management including resume screening tools, benefits counseling surveys, satisfaction surveys and sample service tracking forms.
